# Clear Path QHHT

> Quantum Healing Hypnosis Technique (QHHT) sessions in Albany, NY. Founded by certified practitioner Laura Welles, Clear Path guides clients into theta brainwave states to access their higher self for deep healing, spiritual growth, and self-discovery. Sessions address physical healing, life purpose clarity, emotional release, and inner exploration.

Clear Path is a QHHT practice located at 560 Delaware Ave, Albany, NY 12209. QHHT is a therapeutic hypnosis technique developed by Dolores Cannon over 45+ years that facilitates access to the higher self through guided relaxation. Sessions are 4-6 hours and include life history interview, hypnosis journey, higher self dialogue, audio recording, and post-session support.

## Core Services

- [QHHT Session](https://clearpath.love/services.html): 4-6 hour comprehensive quantum healing experience ($350) including pre-session interview, guided hypnosis, higher self dialogue, complete audio recording, and 7 days of email support
- [Follow-Up Integration Session](https://clearpath.love/services.html): 60-minute session ($100) for discussing and integrating insights from initial session
- [Free Discovery Call](https://clearpath.love/contact.html): 20-minute complimentary consultation to discuss QHHT and determine fit

## About the Practice

- [About Laura Welles](https://clearpath.love/about.html): Certified QHHT practitioner with biology degree and 20 years in environmental conservation; completed official Dolores Cannon QHHT training in January 2025
- [What to Expect in Your First Session](https://clearpath.love/blog/what-to-expect-first-session.html): Complete guide to session structure, preparation tips, and what happens during the hypnosis journey
- [Contact & Booking](https://clearpath.love/contact.html): Schedule sessions at 560 Delaware Ave, Albany, NY; response within 24-48 hours

## Educational Resources

- [Understanding the Higher Self Connection](https://clearpath.love/blog/understanding-higher-self.html): Explores the concept of higher self and its role in QHHT healing
- [Past Life Exploration](https://clearpath.love/blog/past-life-exploration.html): Explains how past life imagery may emerge during sessions and its therapeutic applications
- [Blog](https://clearpath.love/blog.html): Educational content about QHHT methodology and healing experiences
- [Resources](https://clearpath.love/resources.html): Curated directory of complementary practitioners in Albany area, recommended books, and QHHT-related online resources
